channel.title: Distress message 2
channel.description:
Message has been detected:
Playing DISTRESS MESSAGE 2 from an unknown source:
https://soundcloud.com/xiejramusic/d-str3s-me-s4g3_unknown
Proceed with caution...
•Message will delete in 7 days•
Hello everyone, My name is Xiejra and today is my birthday. I have been producing music for around 6 months so far, and so much has happened in that time.
Firstly I would like to say thank you to a few of my friends on the Disco server:
@Xicon had fun collaborating with you! would love to do more in the future.
@anon35891271 thanks for the support during the last few months of me being here
@HELIXX Probably inspired me to do loads of new stuff whether you realised it or not!
@xavior thanks for being a massive influence and being so supportive of my work.
@MR_ANDERSON thanks for believing in me and helping me out!
These are just a few if the people who have really welcomed me into this community and to that I say thank you all!
Anyway... So Today I am officially announcing my first and last Auxy made album: “Limitations And A Bad Case Of Perfectionism” not a particularly catchy name but it is all that is my feelings towards music at this stage that I can express through words.
My Tracks I can assure you will be like nothing you have heard before. Here is a preview of what is to come, I hope you all like it.
stay tuned...
EDIT: I may not leave the community I may just become very inactive
~X
•Message closed•

item.title: Distress message 2
item.dc:creator: Xiejra
item.description:
Oh yes of cause! Auxy is perfect for when you suddenly have an idea.

Whether it be on the go or in the middle of the night, instead of openeing up ableton which would take time, I would do it by writing it in Auxy.

I will probably continue to ise Auxy but not to write full songs.

Read full topic

item.title: Distress message 2
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Ahaa. Cool.

I have Ableton too, but I still think Auxy’s ideal for those moments when inspiration strikes and you just want to get something down and explore it a bit.

I don’t use Ableton as much as a should do, given that I coughed out for Suite, but I do intend to get back into it.

Still, I think Auxy will stay a significant part of my creative process.

Read full topic

item.title: Distress message 2
item.dc:creator: Xiejra
item.description:
Yeah. As of today I now have the money to buy ableton

Read full topic

item.title: Distress message 2
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Xiejra:

My Tracks I can assure you will be like nothing you have heard before.

That’s a bold (clickbait-y) claim!
Of course, I’ll check it out.

So, did I miss a memo?
Why are you bailing out on Auxy and/or this place?

Onwards and upwards?

Read full topic

item.title: Distress message 2
item.dc:creator: HELIXX
item.description:
Happy birthday thanks for the kind words

Read full topic

item.title: Distress message 2
item.dc:creator: SpaghettiSauce
item.description:
Yes, thank you for this. Sad to see you leave Auxy, but I know it will make you a much better producer.

Read full topic

item.title: Distress message 2
item.dc:creator: MR_ANDERSON
item.description:
Hey man! Thank YOU for making sweet music and for showing the community the furthest reaches of Auxy potential! I hope that your musical journey will continue to be as awesome as it’s already been!

Read full topic

item.title: Distress message 2
item.dc:creator: Xicon
item.description:
Happy birthday, my dude. I appreciate your Mix!

Read full topic

item.title: Distress message 2
item.dc:creator: foryou
item.description:
dude i wish you weren’t leaving but good luck with whatever you’re doing after auxy! we’ll never forget you

Read full topic

Happy birthday!
I’ll check this song out soon

item.description:

Playing DISTRESS MESSAGE 2 from an unknown source:

https://soundcloud.com/xiejramusic/d-str3s-me-s4g3_unknown

Proceed with caution…

•Message will delete in 7 days•

Hello everyone, My name is Xiejra and today is my birthday.
I have been producing music for around 6 months so far, and so much has happened in that time.

Firstly I would like to say thank you to a few of my friends on the Disco server:

@Xicon had fun collaborating with you! would love to do more in the future.

@anon35891271 thanks for the support during the last few months of me being here

@HELIXX Probably inspired me to do loads of new stuff whether you realised it or not!

@xavior thanks for being a massive influence and being so supportive of my work.

@MR_ANDERSON thanks for believing in me and helping me out!

These are just a few if the people who have really welcomed me into this community and to that I say thank you all!

Anyway… So Today I am officially announcing my first and last Auxy made album: “Limitations And A Bad Case Of Perfectionism”
not a particularly catchy name but it is all that is my feelings towards music at this stage that I can express through words.

My Tracks I can assure you will be like nothing you have heard before. Here is a preview of what is to come, I hope you all like it.

stay tuned…

EDIT: I may not leave the community I may just become very inactive

~X

•Message closed•
